      • setNumberOfThumbs

        public MultiSlider setNumberOfThumbs(int numThumbs,
                                     boolean repositon)
        Re-sets the number of thumbs
        Parameters:
        numThumbs - the new number of thumbs
        repositon - if true it will reposition the thumbs to be equally distributed across the scale, otherwise all thumbs will be positioned at 0
        Returns:
        the MultiSlider

        public void setKeyProgressIncrement(int increment)
        Sets the amount of progress changed via the arrow keys.
        Parameters:

      • getKeyProgressIncrement

        public int getKeyProgressIncrement()
        Returns the amount of progress changed via the arrow keys.

        By default, this will be a value that is derived from the max progress.

        Returns:
        The amount to increment or decrement when the user presses the arrow keys. This will be positive.

      • setMax

        public void setMax(int max)
        Set global maximum value and apply it to all thumbs
        Parameters:
        max - maximum value in scale points

      • setMax

        public void setMax(int max,
                   boolean extendMaxForThumbs)
        Set global maximum value
        Parameters:
        max - maximum value in scale points
        extendMaxForThumbs - if set to true the new max will be applied to all the thumbs.

      • setMax

        public void setMax(int max,
                   boolean extendMaxForThumbs,
                   boolean repositionThumbs)
        Set global maximum value
        Parameters:
        max - maximum value in scale points
        extendMaxForThumbs - if set to true the new max will be applied to all the thumbs.
        repositionThumbs - if set to true the thumbs will change their value and be placed on equal distances from each other respecting the new scale

        Parameters:
        min - minimum value in scale points

      • setMin

        public void setMin(int min,
                   boolean extendMinForThumbs)
        Set global minimum value
        Parameters:
        min - minimum value in scale points
        extendMinForThumbs - if set to true the new min will be applied to all the thumbs.

      • setMin

        public void setMin(int min,
                   boolean extendMinForThumbs,
                   boolean repositionThumbs)
        Set global minimum value
        Parameters:
        min - minimum value in scale points
        extendMinForThumbs - if set to true the new min will be applied to all the thumbs.
        repositionThumbs - if set to true the thumbs will change their value and be placed on equal distances from each other respecting the new scale
